name: Static (itch) (Rixic)
description:
WARNING: This game contains flashing imagery and   may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.
This game also contains references to drug abuse, abuse and suicide.

Experiences & Memories of the protagonist are visually represented through a dream-like world.

"Glitches seeping through; showing fragments of a broken man."

Average playtime: 30 minutes.

I highly recommend avoiding the video if you have any intention of playing the game, the games experiences and emotions are best described to you, the user, through play. Enjoy. 

Want to know more about this project? Click here.

WASD | Movement
Space | Jump
L.  Shift |  Sprint
E | Interact
